sentences.sentence: My father put up red couplets on the doors and red paper-cutting on the windows.
sentences.translation: 我父亲在门上贴了红色的对联，在窗户上贴了红色的剪纸。

sentences.sentence: They paste up Spring Festival couplets, greeting the New Year and saying goodbye to the old year.
Translated by Xu Yuanchong, this famous poem, with four couplets, was written by Du Fu (712-770, Tang Dynasty) when he was living and farming in Chengdu.
sentences.translation: 许渊冲翻译的这首著名四联诗是杜甫（712-770，唐代）在成都生活和务农时写的。
